data.name: Rune Factory 5 - Rune Factory Series Outfit Set
data.detailed_description:
This set contains the following outfits from past games in the Rune Factory series:
- Rune Factory Outfits: Raguna and Mist
- Rune Factory 2 Outfits: Kyle and Mana
- Rune Factory 3 Outfits: Micah and Shara

"Mist's Outfit," "Mana's Outfit," and "Shara's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Raguna's Outfit," "Kyle's Outfit," and "Micah's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
data.about_the_game:
This set contains the following outfits from past games in the Rune Factory series:
- Rune Factory Outfits: Raguna and Mist
- Rune Factory 2 Outfits: Kyle and Mana
- Rune Factory 3 Outfits: Micah and Shara

"Mist's Outfit," "Mana's Outfit," and "Shara's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Raguna's Outfit," "Kyle's Outfit," and "Micah's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 5 on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
